notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the fence-agents SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2. It addresses 2 CVEs: CVE-2024-56201, CVE-2024-56326.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Canonical URL for this CSAF document

document.title: fence-agents security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2

remediations.details: Update fence-agents to version 4.10.0-76.el9_2.92ciq_lts.4 or later from CIQ repositories
